page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content:
HOUSING IN THE AREA CONSISTS MAINLY OF POST WAR DEVELOPMENT. THERE ARE A FEW OLDER PROPERTIES MOST OF WHICH DATE FROM AROUND 1850, BUT SOME FROM AS FAR BACK AS THE 17TH CENTURY.
THE MAJORITY OF HOUSES ARE PRIVATELY OWNED, THE OTHERS BEING RENTED OUT BY THE DISTRICT COUNCIL OR A PROPERTY COMPANY.
AT PRESENT IT IS DIFFICULT TO OBTAIN PLANNING PERMISSION FOR NEW DEVELOPMENTS DUE TO THE CURRENT POLICY OF "INFILL DEVELOPMENT ONLY" AND THE SEWERAGE SYSTEM BEING AT FULL CAPACITY.
THERE IS NO MAINS GAS IN THE AREA, THE ONLY MEANS OF HOUSEHOLD POWER BEING ELECTRICITY,OIL,SOLID FUEL AND LIQUIFIED PETROLEUM GAS.
